# virtualMachine

**Instance Property**

The VM to display in the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var virtualMachine: VZVirtualMachine? { get set }
```

## Configuring the VM

- **automaticallyReconfiguresDisplay**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the graphics display associated with this view automatically reconfigures with respect to view changes.
- **capturesSystemKeys**: A Boolean value that determines whether the system should send certain system keyboard shortcuts to the guest instead of the host.
